You should.
When you strike down a lamb for its glorious meat, despite the protests by the vegans, you know it is a sacrifice for the gods. And the gods have gifted you with the rights of that succulent meat for it is yours to eat.

Also, why do vegans hate meat-eaters so much? We have our rights! We didn't stop you from eating plants! Did you not hear the leaves scream in agony as you pluck them from their roots?!

Starlight Glimmer is quite possibly the creepiest villain in the show yet

And when we've had a vengeful demigoddess threatening the world with eternal darkness, a god of chaos made up of different animal parts, a shapeshifting insect queen with a horde of minions, a slaver king made of shadows and a huge goat-satan thing that eats magic, that's saying a lot.
